metadata.title: CVE-2023-41323 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI stands for Gestionnaire Libre de Parc Informatique is a Free Asset andIT Management Software package, that provides ITIL Service Desk features,licenses tracking and software auditing. An unauthenticated user canenumerate users logins. Users are advised to upgrade to version 10.0.10.There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
